- Add comprehensive setup documentation

Technical details:
- Intake form creates/updates founder records in Notion database
- Follow-up forms append responses to session page content blocks
- Auto-creates Follow-Up section structure if missing
- Handles pagination for large session pages
- Stores Q1-Q6 field theory questions as database properties
